Name: Hexanome
About the game: Hexanome is a turn-based puzzle game. It's a sequel to the previous game Hexa Turn. This time you play as a triangle and AI tries to stop you. Pick your next move carefully in order to collect all squares and outsmart the AI. Hexanome contains 76 fresh and challenging puzzles. Can you outsmart the AI again? Key Features Clever puzzle experience Carefully crafted 76 unique levels Beautifully designed minimalist visuals Calming music and sound effects 14 Steam achievements
